rooms.name: Entrance Lobby
rooms.description: Spacious entrance with natural light from a large window and ventilation openings.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Central living area for joint family gatherings, open plan design to ensure natural light and airflow. Features large windows and cross ventilation.

rooms.name: Dining Room
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living room with a view of the garden to enhance natural light. Includes ample space for joint family meals.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern kitchen designed in Chettinad style with a mix of traditional and contemporary elements. Ventilation is ensured by an exhaust system and window placements.

rooms.name: Family Room
rooms.description: Semi-private area for family gatherings, placed near living room to promote natural light and ventilation.

rooms.name: Guest Room 1
rooms.description: Cozy guest room with direct access to a small patio ensuring natural light and ventilation.

rooms.name: Ground Floor Bathroom
rooms.description: Functional bathroom for family members living on the ground floor.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: Dedicated home office with ample natural light and a serene view to maintain productivity. Designed with sound insulation in mind.

rooms.name: Storage Room
rooms.description: Additional storage room integrated into the design for joint family utilities.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom 1
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with a private balcony to ensure ample natural light and ventilation. Adheres to Vastu principles by aligning the bed eastward.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Secondary master bedroom with a balcony for natural light and Vastu-compliant direction placement.

rooms.name: Child Bedroom 1
rooms.description: Cozy bedroom with built-in storage designed for child comfort, ensuring natural light through south-facing windows.

rooms.name: Child Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Another bedroom for children with a focus on ventilation and access to natural light, following Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Bedroom Child 3
rooms.description: Additional child bedroom designed for a joint family with ample natural light and ventilation features.

rooms.name: First Floor Bathroom 1
rooms.description: Functional bathroom adjacent to master bedroom 1 with adequate natural light and proper ventilation.

rooms.name: First Floor Bathroom 2
rooms.description: Secondary bathroom for the children's bedrooms ensuring easy access and natural light.

notes.architectural_style: Chettinad-style villa with a blend of traditional and modern design elements, focusing on natural light and ventilation.
notes.building_norms: Designed to meet local building codes in India, ensuring safe occupancy for joint families.
notes.vastu_principles: Room placements and directional alignments have been considered to enhance positive energy flow.
